snippet: Only eight days after having an emergency appendectomy, Max Pacioretty set up David Desharnais for a tip-in goal that helped the Canadiens to a 2-1 victory over the Senators.
abstract: NHL Roundup; Montreal Canadiens defeat Ottawa Senators, 2-1; other hockey scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Only eight days after having an emergency appendectomy, Max Pacioretty set up David Desharnais for a tip-in goal that helped the Canadiens to a 2-1 victory over the Senators.

headline.main: Montreal Tops Ottawa, Aided by Quick Healing
headline.print_headline: Montreal Tops Ottawa, Aided by Quick Healing
